document: SUPERCONDUCTIVITY IN THIN FILMS by RAM DAS CHAUDHARI B.Sc. University of Agra, 1949 M.Sc. University of Agra, 1953 A THESIS SUBMITTED IN PARTIAL FULFILMENT OF THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE DEGREE OF DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in the Department of PHYSICS We accept this thesis as conforming to the required standard THE UNIVERSITY OF BRITISH COLUMBIA December, 1963
